title: Bounty Star
author: Bounty Star
content: WEBSITE - WHITEPAPER - TELEGRAM - TWITTER1. Bounty campaign will be managed by BountyStar.2.  250,000 CYCLN tokens are allocated for this Bounty.3. The bounty program was launched on 15.05.2022 and will run until 28.05.2022Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed.BountyStar team can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We are responsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.1. All participants must join Cycln's official Telegram Group. 2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the BountyStar's Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behaviour will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.7. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Proof Of Registration Post Format: Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BEP-20 Wallet Address:Twitter           40%Telegram           20%Reddit           15%YouTube         15%Submit Your Weekly Report On This Thread.Week 1 (15.05 - 21.05)Week 2 (22.05 - 28.05)Complaint missing stakes or other problem by complaint form below.Complaint FormComplaint SpreadsheetNote: Complaints will be checked every week.Rewards:  1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Cycln's Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 5 retweets per week. Create your own tweets about this project, if not enough tweets from official Twitter. Retweets should be with positive comment and hashtags. (maximum 1 retweet/Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use @Cycl_Ntoken $CYCLN #Play2Earn #Cycling #Invest #gems #BSC #Binance hashtags in every retweet/tweet.How to join:1. Join the Cycln's official Telegram Group.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form: Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Update your Telegram name to "Your Name | Cycln Fan''. Only one project is allowed in your Telegram name.2. Replace your profile picture with Cycln Logo.3. Write at least 1 constructive messages on this group: https://t.me/cyclncommunity and 4 messages weekly in other crypto-related telegram groups with a minimum of 1k members.Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered as spamming.4. Deleted messages will not be counted.5. Report your telegram message links weekly.6. You must wear Cycln's avatar and text until the end of the campaign.How to join:1. Join the Cycln's official Telegram Group.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form:Rewards:  1. Have more than 500 Karma: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 Karma: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 Karma: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10000 Karma: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Participants must have 500+ positive karma2. Must publish 5 articles weekly on top Reddit groups or pages.3. Posts should have a minimum of 70 characters.How to join:1. Join the Cycln's official Telegram Group.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form:Rewards: High quality: 5 stakes Good quality: 3 stakes Average quality: 1 stakeRules:1. Participants must have at least 100+ youtube subscribers. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length.2. Each participant can send 1 video only.3. Video Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, Tokensale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. 6. Bot voices will not be rewarded. But, a good quality animation video with bot voices will be rewarded.7. Poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.8. Videos should never be removed, Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have the project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other social media.10. Please provide the wallet address and enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!How to join:1. Join the Cycln's official Telegram Group.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form:
